text: Sano chilandanyo cha wandu waakutolaga ipanje yao pakusachilila chinonyelo cha Allah, ni kusimichisya kwakutyochela mâ€™mitima mwao (kuti Allah chachalipila), chili chisawu n'gunda wauli pa chiwata chakunyakuchila nikumputila wula jejinji nikoposya isogosi yakwe mwa chitupyo chakusogola kawili, nambo naga ngamputila wula jejinji, nikuti jamawawa (jikunkwanagape nikusogola mujikusogolelaga migunda jine). Sano Allah ichindu yankutenda awele Jwakuilolechesya
